definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: It's not moral to read the personal letter without permission.
sentences.chinese: 未經允許拆閱個人信件不道德。

sentences.english: A contract founded on a disgraceful consideration or against good morals is null.
sentences.chinese: 基於不道德的約定或違反公序良俗的契約無效。
以邪惡或者不道德爲特點。

sentences.english: Now, some people might look down on worm's nechanics, call it immoral.
sentences.chinese: 可能有些人看不起蟲子出老千，認爲這是不道德的。

sentences.english: The peanut industry also condemned the company, portraying it as a rogue operator.
sentences.chinese: 花生工業界也譴責這個公司不道德的欺詐的經營操作。

sentences.english: Sex outside of marriage is usually immoral.
sentences.chinese: 婚外性和諧行爲通常是不道德的。

sentences.english: By the gusty thing I mean, This man is wicked in what he did.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是這個男人所做的一切都是不道德的。

sentences.english: These days - are fast, love don't last in this graceless age.
sentences.chinese: 這個年代太匆忙，愛無法繼續，在這個不道德的時代。

sentences.english: It is unethical for a boss to use someone as a whipping boy.
sentences.chinese: 一名老闆把別人當爲替死鬼，是很不道德的。

sentences.english: Firms have a responsibility not to ever act unethically .
sentences.chinese: 商店有責任避免不道德的行徑。

sentences.english: No gambling, pharmaceuticals or spammy, unethical stuff like that.
sentences.chinese: 禁止賭博，藥品或垃圾，這樣的不道德的東西。

sentences.english: It is unmoral to take advantage of the deformities.
sentences.chinese: 利用殘疾人是不道德的。

sentences.english: Sex outside marriage is usually immoral.
sentences.chinese: 婚外性行爲是不道德的。

sentences.english: But let no one think that pleasure is immoral.
sentences.chinese: 但還是不要讓人們認爲尋歡就是不道德。

sentences.english: The sore is orally ignored by the ignorant immoral man.
sentences.chinese: 瘡痛被無知的不道德者口頭忽視了。

definition: harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
to harm others without benefiting oneself (idiom)
